name: ​EnhancedLink​Capability

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description with a 500 character limit.

fields.name: linkRecordId
fields.description: A ID associated with the link if the link URL refers to a Salesforce

fields.name: linkUrl
fields.description: A link URL to a detail page if available content can’t display

fields.name: title
fields.description: A title to a detail page.

description: If a feed element has this capability, it has a link that may contain supplemental information like an icon, a title, and a description.
